meanings.sent1: The magnetizers in the lab were experts at making objects attract each other.
meanings.sent2: The group of magnetizers worked together to charge the magnets.
meanings.sent3: The magnetizers at the circus made the metal balls dance in the air.
meanings.sent4: She was a magnetizer of emotions, drawing people towards her with her warmth.
meanings.sent5: The magnetizers wore special gloves to avoid getting stuck to the powerful magnets.

meanings.sent1: The magnetizers gathered for a conference on magnetic fields.
meanings.sent2: In the museum, you can see many ancient magnetizers used by different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The magnetizers on the shelf looked like a colorful collection of tools.
meanings.sent4: The magnetizers on the fridge held up all the important notes and pictures.
meanings.sent5: The magnetizers were essential for the experiment to succeed in attracting metal objects.
